title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to John H. McCue, May 7, 1859
summary: Jedediah Hotchkiss asks John McCue for legal advice concerning a suit against Hotchkiss. Hotchkiss also writes of the pleasantness of the Springs, and shares other personal news.
keywords: Arts/Leisure, Church/Religious Activity, Economy, Family, Home Front, State Government, Women, American Civil War
